name: Drawn to Life Collection
description:
Help save Raposa Village from a shadow-like evil and rebuild it back to greatness by creating a Hero in Drawn to Life Collection, 2 games in one!

Drawn to Life Features:

• Draw your own Hero, customize their world and watch your creations come to life!
• Complete your adventure by creating weapons, tools, animals, plants and more!
• Play exciting mini-games such as snowball fights, festivals and wishing wells.

Drawn to Life The Next Chapter Features:

• Choose from a variety of drawing tools, brushes and colors to create your artwork!
• Use your Nintendo Wi-Fi connection to swap creations with friends playing Drawn to Life.
• Morph your Hero into a blob or spider to help you advance through multiple levels and 4 new worlds!

As of May 20, 2014, the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection service for Nintendo DSi and Wii systems has been retired. Online features of this game are no longer available after this date but this game still provides an entertaining experience in offline mode.
